Frequency once per day;

Trigger A creature that has blood and is not at its maximum Hit Points hits you with a melee Strike;

Effect You channel salt and brine from your blood into the creatureâ€™s wounds. The creature must attempt a Fortitude save using your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher. On a failure, the creature takes [[/r 1d6 #persistent acid]] persistent acid damage and is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Sickened]{Sickened 1} by the pain.
